evaluator.#ttlDescription: Time To Live for the Evaluator Instance (Minutes) - Instances recreated once TTL lapses.
evaluator.#minInstancesDescription: Minimum number of available Evaluator Instances to keep in memory
evaluator.#maxInstancesDescription: Maximum number of available Evaluator Instances to keep in memory

validator.#ttlDescription: Time To Live for the Validator Instance (Minutes) - Instances recreated once TTL lapses.
validator.#minInstancesDescription: Minimum number of available Validator Instances to keep in memory
validator.#maxInstancesDescription: Maximum number of available Validator Instances to keep in memory
